data.comment: The match is underway. Nottingham have kicked-off.
Sam Morsy (Middlesbrough) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 34, Djed Spence is replacing Sam Morsy for the home team.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Middlesbrough have kicked-off the second half at Riverside.
In the minute 46, Chris Hughton is making the team's first substitution at Riverside with Joe Lolley replacing Sammy Ameobi.
At Riverside, Tobias Figueiredo has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Nottingham make their second substitution with Cafu replacing Luke Freeman.
In the minute 69, The home team replace Britt Assombalonga with Chuba Akpom.
Lyle Taylor is on a sub for Miguel Angel Guerrero for Nottingham.
Middlesbrough make their third substitution with Marvin Johnson replacing Hayden Coulson.
In the minute 81, Marvin Johnson scores to make it 1-0 at Riverside.
Gaetan Bong (Nottingham) has received a yellow card from Lee Stephen Mason.
